external_games.name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter II - Broken Wings
Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter II: "Broken Wings"

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter II - Broken Wings
summary: Fight for justice in Chapter II of this anime-themed graphic adventure game! Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter II - Broken Wings is the the second release in the episodic NALE series. This has now been delisted for anyone who doesn't already own it; the content of this game was rolled into the collected release "Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One".
